name: Adam
language: Fluent English and Egyptian. Fully understand western and Egyptian
about: I am a Radiation Therapist at Liverpool Cancer Therapy Center in Sydney Australia.
place: I live in the Blue Mountains. I am happily showing you the hiking tracks, bike tracks, beautiful scenarios, cafes, bars and restaurants or I can take you to famous Coogee to Bondi walk.

name: Cansu
about: I studied sociology at Galatasaray University (one of the best universities of Turkey) and did my master degree on Political Studies at EHESS in Paris. I am a really Istanbul lover and know most popular, more historical and each hidden parts of the city
place: As an old Istanbul citizeb, appreciate discovering non-touristic neighborhood and also the most historical parts of Istanbul up to your preferences and your interests

name: Leyla
about: I am from Azerbaijan. How can I help you?
place: I will show you Baku and other places of our country.

name: Thuhu
quote: A girl in love with the Ocean! Lets go look around!
about: Hey all! If you're in the Maldives and want to see around let me know! I'm a certified scuba diver and I love the ocean. if its the under water beauty you are here for, or just want to look around and walk on the white sandy beaches, I'm your girl! :D
place: I'll show you all the local sites, the beautiful white sandy beaches and take you snorkeling in the beautiful reefs of the Maldives :)

name: Karolina
quote: Let me prove u London is more than fish&chips; and Big Ben
about: Hey there. My name is Karolina and im originally from Poland, but moved to London for studies and work in 2020. I work as photographer and model but im happy to show u around this beautiful city which stole my heart when first time I visited! Feel free to check my instagram @rosedamex
place: Im very open minded to what u want to explore and how to spend the time, so feel free to give me any suggestions! We can go either sightsee some of the London landmarks together or go for some events} nightlife etc Im also happy to take some pictures of you as i work as a photographer. If u saw a bit of London already} lets explore hidden SpeakEasy spots and places around London ! Everything is to negotiate!

name: Nobu
about: I’m a Tokyo native who used to live in the US. I love traveling, traditional craftwork, food, and language learning
place: Food, sight seeing, city life. Let me know what activityivities you’d like to do or areas you’d like to explore!

name: Yas
quote: I’m Moroccan enjoying life between Paris and London!
about: I’m Moroccan studying in Paris I’ll be more than happy to show you the finest places in the city of love
place: I can customize your trip depending on your preference and how do you like to spend your day.

name: Jackie
quote: Become a real New Yorker with me!
place: I'm on Showaround to stay connected with my Showaround friends!Become a native New Yorker with me: I know the latest buzz from the thriving artist communities, best food in town that are both high quality and local. I respond quickly and can arrange for you to be immersed in New York culture! Just let me know your bucket list and I will make it happen. ***5 hrs. tour minimum*** Check out my featured article: https://blog.showaround.com/get-to-know-showaround-locals-in-new-york-meet-jackie/
